posts.content:
Yep, got some real Horny bits for you....I have 2 black Horn push buttons, 2 brass contact plates, 2 Chrome rings, all tabs intact, and 2 springs, these Horny parts are not complete pushes so don't get to horny over this, great as a refurb or a spare.
So, these will be sold as two job lots, no splits ( no pun intended ) you get brass contact, spring, horny piece and to top it off you get a shinny ring.........I aim to please.
Cost of this service is £10 set plus postage..
Next is a late style chrome escution for the cargo door, nice nick, could be used as is, genuine part, £15 plus postage
Mail me at ron@vwendangeredspecies.co.uk. to snap up these early Xmas treats.

Rocket Ron
Pic of the black horn push please
Ron is not able to fathom out how to post pictures. Send him an email and he will send pictures. Nice guy..
